file_insights.changes: Created comprehensive Tailwind CSS configuration with light and dark theme color variables using CSS custom properties. Includes semantic color definitions (primary, secondary, destructive, etc.) and establishes design system foundation.
file_insights.significance: Establishes design system tokens for entire application, enabling consistent theming across components

file_insights.changes: Created root layout component with metadata, imported fonts, Header and Footer components. Implements flex-based layout for sticky footer pattern.
file_insights.significance: Core layout structure for all pages; establishes standard header/main/footer layout pattern

file_insights.changes: Created home page with welcome heading and introductory text using Tailwind utility classes
file_insights.significance: Entry point for blog application; minimal placeholder content for testing layout structure

file_insights.changes: Created reusable header component with logo/brand link and navigation menu. Includes hover effects and responsive layout.
file_insights.significance: Reusable navigation component establishing consistent header across all pages

file_insights.changes: Created reusable footer component with dynamic copyright year, responsive flex layout, and policy/contact links
file_insights.significance: Reusable footer component with practical features (dynamic year); establishes footer navigation pattern

file_insights.changes: Updated path alias from './src/*' to './*' to match actual project structure
file_insights.significance: Fixes TypeScript module resolution to prevent import errors when using @ alias

patterns_discovered.description: Uses CSS custom properties to define semantic color tokens (--primary, --secondary, --destructive, etc.) with separate light/dark theme definitions in :root and .dark selectors
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enables theme switching and consistent design language across entire application

patterns_discovered.description: Uses flex layout on html body with 'flex-1' on main content to push footer to bottom regardless of content height
patterns_discovered.benefit: Eliminates need for fixed positioning or margin hacks; semantic and responsive

patterns_discovered.description: Separates Header and Footer into reusable components imported by root layout
patterns_discovered.benefit: Promotes reusability and maintainability; changes to navigation automatically apply everywhere

patterns_discovered.description: All navigation uses Next.js Link component with consistent hover states and styling patterns
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enables client-side routing; consistent UX across navigation elements

patterns_discovered.description: Uses Tailwind utility classes for all component styling instead of custom CSS
patterns_discovered.benefit: Fast development, consistent spacing/sizing, minimal CSS overhead

gotchas_discovered.description: tsconfig.json initially pointed to './src/*' but the actual project structure uses './*' in the app root directory. This would cause import resolution failures.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Corrected path alias configuration in tsconfig.json. Verify project structure before setting up path aliases.

gotchas_discovered.description: Footer uses 'new Date().getFullYear()' which executes at component render time. In Next.js, this could cause hydration mismatches if server and client render at different times (though unlikely within same minute).
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Currently acceptable for footer use case, but consider making this a static value or using client component if hydration issues arise.

gotchas_discovered.description: Header and Footer contain hardcoded navigation links (/about, /privacy, /terms, /contact) that don't yet have corresponding pages or routes defined.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: These links will cause 404 errors when clicked. Need to either remove them or create the corresponding page components.

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created foundational blog layout and base components with proper React/Next.js architecture
accomplishments: Established comprehensive design system via CSS custom properties
Created reusable Header and Footer components
Implemented semantic root layout with proper structure
Used modern Next.js patterns (App Router, metadata, dynamic imports)
approach_outcome.completeness: Core layout and component structure complete; ready for content components and routing expansion

recommendations.recommendation: Create placeholder pages for hardcoded links
recommendations.rationale: Header and Footer reference /about, /privacy, /terms, /contact pages that don't exist yet. Create these pages or remove the links to prevent broken navigation.

recommendations.recommendation: Extract navigation configuration to centralized data structure
recommendations.rationale: Navigation links are duplicated between Header and Footer. Centralizing them enables consistency and easier maintenance.
recommendations.implementation: Create a config file (e.g., navigation.ts) with navigation items array that both components can import

recommendations.recommendation: Consider responsive mobile menu for header
recommendations.rationale: Current header navigation doesn't have mobile menu toggle, which may cause layout issues on small screens
recommendations.implementation: Add hamburger menu component with mobile-first navigation pattern

recommendations.rationale: Standard accessibility pattern allows screen reader users and keyboard navigators to skip header
recommendations.implementation: Add hidden link at start of layout that jumps to main content

recommendations.recommendation: Document color token usage in design system
recommendations.rationale: CSS color variables are defined but their intended semantic usage isn't documented
recommendations.implementation: Create design system documentation or add comments explaining when to use each color token
